pages.text: I saw the master magician craft this bottle on his ritual altar. It appears to gift the holder with seemingly random items simply by having the time pass. $(italic)Using$() the bottle, when full, shall reward you. Shaking it through jumping while holding it in your hotbar speeds it up a little!

pages.title: Magic, in a bottle
pages.text: Whispers from another dimension tell me that a similar item exists there, warping time instead? Maybe I should hold off on the grog for a while..
